about_the_game:
The Jaguaress, an eccentric Andean deity, greets you at the velvet curtain and casts you as Inti, a young man who dreamed of being a drug lord but landed in prison. Prison X is an immersive mythological play sweeping you into a Bolivian prison, where you coexist with devils and corrupt prison guards.

Festivals where Prison X premiered: Sundance Film Festival, Cannes XR, SXSW and Games for Change in New York.

short_description: Heavy doors open and you're swept into the surreal world of Prison X, an infamous Bolivian jail in the Neo-Andean underworld. As you navigate amongst devils, saints, wicked characters, corrupt prison guards and even a Western filmmaker; hold onto your soul so La Diabla doesn't snatch it away.
